component.description: SplitButton displays a default command and additional ones in an overlay.
component.attributes:
&command_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
ajax false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies the submit mode, when set to true (default), submit would be made with Ajax.
async false java.lang.Boolean false When set to true, ajax requests are not queued.
process false java.lang.String Component(s) to process partially instead of whole view.
update false java.lang.String Component(s) to be updated with ajax.
onstart false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute before ajax request is begins.
oncomplete false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when ajax request is completed.
onerror false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when ajax request fails.
onsuccess false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when ajax request succeeds.
global false java.lang.Boolean true Defines whether to trigger ajaxStatus or not.
accesskey false java.lang.String true Access key that when pressed transfers focus to the button.
alt false java.lang.String true Alternate textual description of the button.
dir false java.lang.String true Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are LTR and RTL.
disabled false java.lang.String true Disables the button.
image false java.lang.String true Style class representing the button icon.
label false java.lang.String true A localized user presentable name.
lang false java.lang.String true Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
tabindex false java.lang.String true Position of the button element in the tabbing order.
title false java.lang.String true Advisory tooltip informaton.
type false java.lang.String true Sets the behavior of the button. Default is submit.
readonly false java.lang.String true Flag indicating that this component will prevent changes by the user.
style false java.lang.String true Inline style of the button element.
styleClass false java.lang.String true Style class of the button element.
onblur false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when button loses focus.
onchange false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when button loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
onclick false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when button is clicked.
ondblclick false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when button is double clicked.
onfocus false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when button receives focus.
onkeydown false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over button.
onkeypress false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over button.
onkeyup false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a key is released over button.
onmousedown false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is pressed down over button.
onmousemove false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved within button.
onmouseout false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved away from button.
onmouseover false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved onto button.
onmouseup false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is released over button.
onselect false java.lang.String true Client side callback to execute when text within button is selected by user.
icon false java.lang.String Icon of the button.
iconPos false java.lang.String left Position of the icon, default value is left.
inline false java.lang.Boolean false Displays button inline instead of fitting the content width, only used by mobile.
partialSubmit false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, only values related to partially processed components would be serialized for ajax instead of whole form.
